vdi_pwd_policy_length: The password must be between {{min}} and {{max}} characters.
vdi_pwd_policy_letterMandatory: The password must contain at least one letter.
vdi_pwd_policy_lowerMandatory: The password must contain at least one lower case letter.
vdi_pwd_policy_upperMandatory: The password must contain at least one capital letter.
vdi_pwd_policy_digitMandatory: The password must contain at least one number.
vdi_pwd_policy_specialMandatory: The password must contain at least one special character.
vdi_pwd_policy_deniedChars: The password must not contain the {{chars}} characters.
vdi_pwd_password_generated: Generate a random password. You will receive this password via email.
vdi_change_username_policy: It should be fairly long, with special characters, but not too complicated.
vdi_change_username_err_username: It should be fairly long, with special characters, but not too complicated.
vdi_console_info: You will receive an email detailing the procedure to follow in order to log in to your Cloud Desktop console. Do you wish to continue?
vdi_console_done: You will receive an email for your console access request.
